body.value: The title "Lucky Strike" immediatley brings to mind the cigarette brand, hinting at a critique of consumer culture  and advertising. In the 1980s, Haring was very aware of how commercial imagery influenced society. He often used brand logos to comment on how corporations shape public opinion and manipulate desires. Using a well-known cigarette brand could represent teh dangers of mass marketing, especially when it comes to health, addiction, and the glamorization of harmful products.
